attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: or we must apply the same rule to all workers in the UK, including Members of Parliament, Civil Servants, Judges etc.  If the Manadatory Retirement Age of 65 years applies, then it should apply across the board, otherwise this is direct discrimination!  If this is not feasable, then the reverse rule should be applied and the Mandatory Retirement Age should be abolished immediately.
